title: 求教！日志怎么看啊！
txt_content:
我的游戏启动时出了差错，给我一个日志，内容我复制了，如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 16-7-1 下午7:17
Description: Registering texture

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:293)
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:283)
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:217)
        at bwa.a(SourceFile:46)
        at bwf.a(SourceFile:56)
        at bwf.a(SourceFile:38)
        at boh.<init>(SourceFile:205)
        at bcx.an(SourceFile:533)
        at bcx.a(SourceFile:381)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:112)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:293)
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:283)
        at bwh.a(SourceFile:217)
        at bwa.a(SourceFile:46)

-- Resource location being registered --
Details:
        Resource location: minecraft:textures/misc/forcefield.png
        Texture object class: bwa
Stacktrace:
        at bwf.a(SourceFile:56)
        at bwf.a(SourceFile:38)
        at boh.<init>(SourceFile:205)
        at bcx.an(SourceFile:533)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at bcx.a(SourceFile:381)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:112)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.10
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_91, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 12003200 bytes (11 MB) / 65011712 bytes (62 MB) up to 65011712 bytes (62 MB)
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx62m
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: HMCL 2.4.1.6
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: Intel(R) HD Graphics Family GL version 3.0.0 - Build 6.14.10.5337, Intel
        GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing.
Using GL 1.3 texture combiners.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.
VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.

        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: 
        Current Language: 简体中文 (中国)
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        CPU: 2x Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @ 2.40GHz


谁能看懂啊！我该怎么办呢？
（不过，我看懂了两个单词：Daisy, daisy...，我翻译成这样：菊花，菊花……，：P）
希望大神给我神回复，{:10_503:}

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 你怎么只设置了62MB内存？调大点，1024MB应该够，不行的话512MB
